title: "run_OQ-Survival-001"
output: html_document

# lung 데이터 로드
```{r}

lung=survival::lung

time=lung$time
status=lung$status
sex=lung$sex

```

# OQ-survival-001
## 기대 결과(참값) 도출
```{r}

pred_res_km=survival::survfit(survival::Surv(time,status-1)~sex)

pred_res_class0=summary(pred_res_km[1],times=800)[c("time","surv","lower","upper")]
pred_res_class1=summary(pred_res_km[2],times=800)[c("time","surv","lower","upper")]

pred_diff=survival::survdiff(survival::Surv(time,status-1)~sex)
pred_res_pval=pred_diff$pvalue

```

## 실제 결과 도출
```{r}

act_km=calc_surv_rate(time,800,status-1,sex)

act_res_km=act_km$km
act_res_class0=act_km$class0
act_res_class1=act_km$class1
act_res_pval=act_km$p

```
